items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: A real-time chat app built with the MERN stack. Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Socket.IO for instant messaging. Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, and Zustand for a responsive and modern UI. Features include real-time communication, scalable backend, and lightweight state management.
items.title: rohit-nainwaya/chat_app: A real-time chat app built with the MERN stack. Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Socket.IO for instant messaging. Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, and Zustand for a responsive and modern UI. Features include real-time communication, scalable backend, and lightweight state management.

items.content_html: An unofficial, open-source Windows desktop version of light.gg, providing a native app experience for users who prefer using it outside the browser. Built with Electron, this app offers a lightweight and seamless way to access light.gg on Windows 10.
items.title: FastDropGaming/light.gg-app: An unofficial, open-source Windows desktop version of light.gg, providing a native app experience for users who prefer using it outside the browser. Built with Electron, this app offers a lightweight and seamless way to access light.gg on Windows 10.
